document.full_text: donald trump may lead the republican field in some opinion polls in the nascent 2012 white house race but experts don't expect americans to elect their first reality tv president.
document.title: is america ready for a reality tv president?
lines_and_colors: donald trump may lead the republican field in some opinion polls in the nascent 2012 white house race but experts don't expect americans to elect their first reality tv president.
